  WHERE (uc.user_id = auth.uid())))

policies.policyname: Admins can manage approvers
policies.qual:
(approval_level_id IN ( SELECT approval_levels.id
   FROM rh.approval_levels
  WHERE (approval_levels.company_id IN ( SELECT user_companies.company_id
           FROM user_companies
          WHERE ((user_companies.user_id = auth.uid()) AND (user_companies.ativo = true) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                   FROM profiles
                  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND ((profiles.permissoes ->> 'admin'::text) = 'true'::text)))))))))

          WHERE ((user_companies.user_id = auth.uid()) AND (user_companies.ativo = true))))))

indexes.indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX almoxarifados_pkey ON almoxarifado.almoxarifados USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_almoxarifados_ativo ON almoxarifado.almoxarifados USING btree (ativo) WHERE (ativo = true)
CREATE INDEX idx_almoxarifados_company_id ON almoxarifado.almoxarifados USING btree (company_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_almoxarifado_codigo_company ON almoxarifado.almoxarifados USING btree (codigo, company_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX checklist_recebimento_pkey ON almoxarifado.checklist_recebimento USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_checklist_recebimento_company_id ON almoxarifado.checklist_recebimento USING btree (company_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_entrada_itens_company_id ON almoxarifado.entrada_itens USING btree (company_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX entradas_materiais_pkey ON almoxarifado.entradas_materiais USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_entradas_company_id ON almoxarifado.entradas_materiais USING btree (company_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_entradas_data ON almoxarifado.entradas_materiais USING btree (data_entrada)
CREATE INDEX idx_entradas_status ON almoxarifado.entradas_materiais USING btree (status)

CREATE INDEX idx_estoque_almoxarifado_material ON almoxarifado.estoque_atual USING btree (almoxarifado_id, material_equipamento_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_estoque_atual_company_id ON almoxarifado.estoque_atual USING btree (company_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_estoque_atual_material ON almoxarifado.estoque_atual USING btree (material_equipamento_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_estoque_company_material ON almoxarifado.estoque_atual USING btree (company_id, material_equipamento_id, quantidade_atual)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_inventario_item ON almoxarifado.inventario_itens USING btree (inventario_id, material_equipamento_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_inventarios_company_id ON almoxarifado.inventarios USING btree (company_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_inventarios_status ON almoxarifado.inventarios USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_inventarios_tipo ON almoxarifado.inventarios USING btree (tipo)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX inventarios_pkey ON almoxarifado.inventarios USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_localizacoes_fisicas_company_id ON almoxarifado.localizacoes_fisicas USING btree (company_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_prefixes_lower_name ON storage.prefixes USING btree (bucket_id, level, ((string_to_array(name, '/'::text))[level]), lower(name) text_pattern_ops)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX prefixes_pkey ON storage.prefixes USING btree (bucket_id, level, name)
CREATE INDEX idx_multipart_uploads_list ON storage.s3_multipart_uploads USING btree (bucket_id, key, created_at)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX s3_multipart_uploads_pkey ON storage.s3_multipart_uploads USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX s3_multipart_uploads_parts_pkey ON storage.s3_multipart_uploads_parts USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX vector_indexes_name_bucket_id_idx ON storage.vector_indexes USING btree (name, bucket_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX vector_indexes_pkey ON storage.vector_indexes USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX schema_migrations_idempotency_key_key ON supabase_migrations.schema_migrations USING btree (idempotency_key)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX schema_migrations_pkey ON supabase_migrations.schema_migrations USING btree (version)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX icms_config_unique ON tributario.icms_config USING btree (company_id, uf, tipo_operacao, cst, data_inicio_vigencia)

CREATE INDEX idx_icms_config_tipo_operacao ON tributario.icms_config USING btree (tipo_operacao)
CREATE INDEX idx_icms_config_uf ON tributario.icms_config USING btree (uf)
CREATE INDEX idx_icms_config_vigencia ON tributario.icms_config USING btree (data_inicio_vigencia, data_fim_vigencia)
CREATE INDEX idx_inss_rat_fap_config_cnae ON tributario.inss_rat_fap_config USING btree (cnae)
CREATE INDEX idx_inss_rat_fap_config_company_id ON tributario.inss_rat_fap_config USING btree (company_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_inss_rat_fap_config_vigencia ON tributario.inss_rat_fap_config USING btree (data_inicio_vigencia, data_fim_vigencia)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX inss_rat_fap_config_pkey ON tributario.inss_rat_fap_config USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX inss_rat_fap_config_unique ON tributario.inss_rat_fap_config USING btree (company_id, cnae, data_inicio_vigencia)
CREATE INDEX idx_ipi_config_company_id ON tributario.ipi_config USING btree (company_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_ipi_config_ncm ON tributario.ipi_config USING btree (ncm)
CREATE INDEX idx_ipi_config_tipo_atividade ON tributario.ipi_config USING btree (tipo_atividade)
CREATE INDEX idx_ipi_config_vigencia ON tributario.ipi_config USING btree (data_inicio_vigencia, data_fim_vigencia)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ipi_config_pkey ON tributario.ipi_config USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_iss_config_company_id ON tributario.iss_config USING btree (company_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_iss_config_municipio ON tributario.iss_config USING btree (codigo_municipio_ibge)
CREATE INDEX idx_iss_config_uf ON tributario.iss_config USING btree (uf)
CREATE INDEX idx_iss_config_vigencia ON tributario.iss_config USING btree (data_inicio_vigencia, data_fim_vigencia)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX iss_config_pkey ON tributario.iss_config USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX iss_config_unique ON tributario.iss_config USING btree (company_id, codigo_municipio_ibge, data_inicio_vigencia)
CREATE INDEX idx_obrigacoes_fiscais_company_id ON tributario.obrigacoes_fiscais USING btree (company_id)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX secrets_name_idx ON vault.secrets USING btree (name) WHERE (name IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX secrets_pkey ON vault.secrets USING btree (id)

views.view_definition:
SELECT cc.id,
    cc.company_id,
    cc.requisicao_id,
    cc.numero_cotacao,
    cc.status,
    cc.prazo_resposta,
    cc.observacoes,
    cc.workflow_state,
    cc.created_at,
    cc.updated_at,
    rc.numero_requisicao,
    rc.data_solicitacao,
    rc.data_necessidade,
    rc.status AS requisicao_status,
    rc.workflow_state AS requisicao_workflow_state,
    rc.created_by AS requisicao_created_by
   FROM (compras.cotacao_ciclos cc
     LEFT JOIN compras.requisicoes_compra rc ON ((rc.id = cc.requisicao_id)));

SELECT rc.company_id,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (rc.status = 'pendente_aprovacao'::compras.status_requisicao) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS requisicoes_pendentes,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (c.status = 'enviada'::compras.status_cotacao) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS cotacoes_enviadas,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (pc.status = 'enviado'::compras.status_pedido) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS pedidos_enviados,
    COALESCE(sum(rc.valor_total_estimado), (0)::numeric) AS valor_total_estimado,
    COALESCE(sum(pc.valor_final), (0)::numeric) AS valor_total_pedidos,
    count(DISTINCT fd.id) AS total_fornecedores
   FROM (((compras.requisicoes_compra rc
     LEFT JOIN compras.cotacoes c ON ((c.requisicao_id = rc.id)))
     LEFT JOIN compras.pedidos_compra pc ON ((pc.cotacao_id = c.id)))
     LEFT JOIN compras.fornecedores_dados fd ON ((fd.company_id = rc.company_id)))
  WHERE (rc.created_at >= (CURRENT_DATE - '30 days'::interval))
  GROUP BY rc.company_id;

SELECT ea.company_id,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (
            CASE
                WHEN (ea.quantidade_atual <= me.estoque_minimo) THEN 'CRITICO'::text
                WHEN ((ea.quantidade_atual)::numeric <= ((me.estoque_minimo)::numeric * 1.5)) THEN 'ATENCAO'::text
                ELSE 'NORMAL'::text
            END = 'CRITICO'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS estoques_criticos,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (
            CASE
                WHEN (ea.quantidade_atual <= me.estoque_minimo) THEN 'CRITICO'::text
                WHEN ((ea.quantidade_atual)::numeric <= ((me.estoque_minimo)::numeric * 1.5)) THEN 'ATENCAO'::text
                ELSE 'NORMAL'::text
            END = 'ATENCAO'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS estoques_atencao,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (
            CASE
                WHEN (ea.quantidade_atual <= me.estoque_minimo) THEN 'CRITICO'::text
                WHEN ((ea.quantidade_atual)::numeric <= ((me.estoque_minimo)::numeric * 1.5)) THEN 'ATENCAO'::text
                ELSE 'NORMAL'::text
            END = 'NORMAL'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS estoques_normais,
    count(*) AS total_materiais_monitorados,
    avg(
        CASE
            WHEN (me.estoque_minimo > 0) THEN ((ea.quantidade_atual)::numeric / (me.estoque_minimo)::numeric)
            ELSE (1)::numeric
        END) AS media_estoque_vs_minimo
   FROM (almoxarifado.estoque_atual ea
     JOIN almoxarifado.materiais_equipamentos me ON ((me.id = ea.material_equipamento_id)))
  WHERE ((me.estoque_minimo IS NOT NULL) AND (me.estoque_minimo > 0))
  GROUP BY ea.company_id;

SELECT rc.company_id,
    rc.id AS requisicao_id,
    rc.numero_requisicao,
    rc.workflow_state AS requisicao_status,
    (array_agg(cc.id ORDER BY cc.created_at))[1] AS cotacao_ciclo_id,
    min(cc.status) AS cotacao_status,
    (array_agg(ct.id ORDER BY ct.created_at))[1] AS cotacao_id,
    min(ct.workflow_state) AS cotacao_fornecedor_status,
    (array_agg(pc.id ORDER BY pc.created_at))[1] AS pedido_id,
    min(pc.workflow_state) AS pedido_status,
    (array_agg(nf.id ORDER BY nf.created_at))[1] AS nf_id,
    min(nf.status) AS nf_status
   FROM ((((compras.requisicoes_compra rc
     LEFT JOIN compras.cotacao_ciclos cc ON ((cc.requisicao_id = rc.id)))
     LEFT JOIN compras.cotacoes ct ON ((ct.cotacao_ciclo_id = cc.id)))
     LEFT JOIN compras.pedidos_compra pc ON ((pc.cotacao_id = ct.id)))
     LEFT JOIN compras.nf_entradas nf ON ((nf.pedido_id = pc.id)))
  GROUP BY rc.company_id, rc.id, rc.numero_requisicao, rc.workflow_state;

SELECT fd.id AS fornecedor_id,
    COALESCE(p.nome_fantasia, p.razao_social) AS fornecedor_nome,
    fd.uf,
    fd.cidade,
    fd.nota_media,
    fd.total_avaliacoes,
    count(pc.id) AS total_pedidos,
    COALESCE(sum(pc.valor_final), (0)::numeric) AS valor_total_compras,
    avg(
        CASE
            WHEN (pc.data_entrega_real IS NOT NULL) THEN (pc.data_entrega_real - pc.data_entrega_prevista)
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS atraso_medio_dias
   FROM ((compras.fornecedores_dados fd
     JOIN partners p ON ((p.id = fd.partner_id)))
     LEFT JOIN compras.pedidos_compra pc ON ((pc.fornecedor_id = fd.id)))
  WHERE ((fd.status)::text = 'ativo'::text)
  GROUP BY fd.id, p.nome_fantasia, p.razao_social, fd.uf, fd.cidade, fd.nota_media, fd.total_avaliacoes
  ORDER BY fd.nota_media DESC;

SELECT userid,
    dbid,
    toplevel,
    queryid,
    query,
    plans,
    total_plan_time,
    min_plan_time,
    max_plan_time,
    mean_plan_time,
    stddev_plan_time,
    calls,
    total_exec_time,
    min_exec_time,
    max_exec_time,
    mean_exec_time,
    stddev_exec_time,
    rows,
    shared_blks_hit,
    shared_blks_read,
    shared_blks_dirtied,
    shared_blks_written,
    local_blks_hit,
    local_blks_read,
    local_blks_dirtied,
    local_blks_written,
    temp_blks_read,
    temp_blks_written,
    shared_blk_read_time,
    shared_blk_write_time,
    local_blk_read_time,
    local_blk_write_time,
    temp_blk_read_time,
    temp_blk_write_time,
    wal_records,
    wal_fpi,
    wal_bytes,
    jit_functions,
    jit_generation_time,
    jit_inlining_count,
    jit_inlining_time,
    jit_optimization_count,
    jit_optimization_time,
    jit_emission_count,
    jit_emission_time,
    jit_deform_count,
    jit_deform_time,
    stats_since,
    minmax_stats_since
   FROM pg_stat_statements(true) pg_stat_statements(userid, dbid, toplevel, queryid, query, plans, total_plan_time, min_plan_time, max_plan_time, mean_plan_time, stddev_plan_time, calls, total_exec_time, min_exec_time, max_exec_time, mean_exec_time, stddev_exec_time, rows, shared_blks_hit, shared_blks_read, shared_blks_dirtied, shared_blks_written, local_blks_hit, local_blks_read, local_blks_dirtied, local_blks_written, temp_blks_read, temp_blks_written, shared_blk_read_time, shared_blk_write_time, local_blk_read_time, local_blk_write_time, temp_blk_read_time, temp_blk_write_time, wal_records, wal_fpi, wal_bytes, jit_functions, jit_generation_time, jit_inlining_count, jit_inlining_time, jit_optimization_count, jit_optimization_time, jit_emission_count, jit_emission_time, jit_deform_count, jit_deform_time, stats_since, minmax_stats_since);

SELECT lp.id,
    lp.company_id,
    lp.numero_lote,
    lp.descricao,
    lp.status,
    lp.valor_total,
    lp.valor_total_retencoes,
    lp.valor_liquido,
    lp.quantidade_titulos,
    lp.data_prevista_pagamento,
    lp.data_envio,
    lp.data_processamento,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((lpi.status_item)::text = 'pago'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS titulos_pagos,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((lpi.status_item)::text = 'rejeitado'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS titulos_rejeitados,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((lpi.status_item)::text = 'incluido'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS titulos_pendentes
   FROM (financeiro.lotes_pagamento lp
     LEFT JOIN financeiro.lote_pagamento_itens lpi ON ((lpi.lote_pagamento_id = lp.id)))
  GROUP BY lp.id, lp.company_id, lp.numero_lote, lp.descricao, lp.status, lp.valor_total, lp.valor_total_retencoes, lp.valor_liquido, lp.quantidade_titulos, lp.data_prevista_pagamento, lp.data_envio, lp.data_processamento;

SELECT cp.id AS conta_pagar_id,
    cp.numero_titulo,
    cp.company_id,
    count(r.id) AS total_retencoes,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((r.status)::text = 'pendente'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS retencoes_pendentes,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((r.status)::text = 'recolhido'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS retencoes_recolhidas,
    COALESCE(sum(r.valor_retencao), (0)::numeric) AS valor_total_retencoes,
    COALESCE(sum(
        CASE
            WHEN ((r.status)::text = 'pendente'::text) THEN r.valor_retencao
            ELSE (0)::numeric
        END), (0)::numeric) AS valor_pendente,
    COALESCE(sum(
        CASE
            WHEN ((r.status)::text = 'recolhido'::text) THEN r.valor_retencao
            ELSE (0)::numeric
        END), (0)::numeric) AS valor_recolhido
   FROM (financeiro.contas_pagar cp
     LEFT JOIN financeiro.retencoes_fonte r ON (((r.conta_pagar_id = cp.id) AND ((r.status)::text <> 'cancelado'::text))))
  GROUP BY cp.id, cp.numero_titulo, cp.company_id;

SELECT v.company_id,
    count(*) AS total_veiculos,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (v.situacao = 'ativo'::frota.vehicle_status)) AS veiculos_ativos,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (v.tipo = 'proprio'::frota.vehicle_type)) AS veiculos_proprios,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (v.tipo = 'locado'::frota.vehicle_type)) AS veiculos_locados,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (v.tipo = 'agregado'::frota.vehicle_type)) AS veiculos_agregados,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (v.situacao = 'manutencao'::frota.vehicle_status)) AS veiculos_manutencao,
    count(d.*) FILTER (WHERE (d.status = 'a_vencer'::frota.document_status)) AS documentos_vencer,
    count(m.*) FILTER (WHERE ((m.status = 'pendente'::frota.maintenance_status) AND (m.data_agendada <= (CURRENT_DATE + '7 days'::interval)))) AS manutencoes_proximas,
    count(o.*) FILTER (WHERE (o.status = 'pendente'::frota.occurrence_status)) AS ocorrencias_pendentes
   FROM (((frota.vehicles v
     LEFT JOIN frota.vehicle_documents d ON ((v.id = d.vehicle_id)))
     LEFT JOIN frota.vehicle_maintenances m ON ((v.id = m.vehicle_id)))
     LEFT JOIN frota.vehicle_occurrences o ON ((v.id = o.vehicle_id)))
  GROUP BY v.company_id;

SELECT m.id,
    m.vehicle_id,
    m.tipo,
    m.descricao,
    m.oficina,
    m.km_proxima,
    m.data_agendada,
    m.data_realizada,
    m.valor,
    m.status,
    m.observacoes,
    m.created_at,
    m.updated_at,
    v.placa,
    v.marca,
    v.modelo,
    v.quilometragem,
        CASE
            WHEN (m.data_agendada IS NOT NULL) THEN m.data_agendada
            WHEN (m.km_proxima IS NOT NULL) THEN NULL::date
            ELSE NULL::date
        END AS proxima_data
   FROM (frota.vehicle_maintenances m
     JOIN frota.vehicles v ON ((m.vehicle_id = v.id)))
  WHERE ((m.status = 'pendente'::frota.maintenance_status) AND ((m.data_agendada <= (CURRENT_DATE + '30 days'::interval)) OR (m.km_proxima <= (v.quilometragem + (1000)::numeric))));

SELECT v.id,
    v.company_id,
    v.tipo,
    v.placa,
    v.renavam,
    v.chassi,
    v.marca,
    v.modelo,
    v.ano,
    v.cor,
    v.quilometragem,
    v.situacao,
    v.proprietario_id,
    v.locadora,
    v.colaborador_id,
    v.created_at,
    v.updated_at,
    c.nome_fantasia AS empresa_nome,
    p.nome_fantasia AS proprietario_nome,
    d.nome AS condutor_atual,
    d.cnh_categoria,
    d.cnh_validade,
    va.status AS status_atribuicao,
    va.km_inicial AS km_atribuicao,
    va.km_final AS km_devolucao
   FROM ((((frota.vehicles v
     LEFT JOIN companies c ON ((v.company_id = c.id)))
     LEFT JOIN partners p ON ((v.proprietario_id = p.id)))
     LEFT JOIN frota.vehicle_assignments va ON (((v.id = va.vehicle_id) AND (va.status = 'em_uso'::frota.assignment_status))))
     LEFT JOIN frota.drivers d ON ((va.driver_id = d.id)));

SELECT d.id,
    d.company_id,
    d.employee_id,
    d.nome,
    d.cpf,
    d.rg,
    d.data_nascimento,
    d.parentesco,
    d.sexo,
    d.estado_civil,
    d.nacionalidade,
    d.naturalidade,
    d.nome_mae,
    d.nome_pai,
    d.cpf_mae,
    d.cpf_pai,
    d.telefone,
    d.email,
    d.endereco,
    d.cidade,
    d.estado,
    d.cep,
    d.data_casamento,
    d.data_uniao_estavel,
    d.data_separacao,
    d.data_obito,
    d.data_nascimento_mae,
    d.escolaridade,
    d.instituicao_ensino,
    d.possui_deficiencia,
    d.tipo_deficiencia,
    d.grau_deficiencia,
    d.necessita_cuidados_especiais,
    d.certidao_nascimento,
    d.certidao_casamento,
    d.certidao_uniao_estavel,
    d.comprovante_residencia,
    d.status,
    d.data_inclusao,
    d.data_exclusao,
    d.motivo_exclusao,
    d.observacoes,
    d.created_at,
    d.updated_at,
    d.created_by,
    d.updated_by,
    e.nome AS funcionario_nome,
    e.matricula AS funcionario_matricula,
    e.cpf AS funcionario_cpf
   FROM (rh.dependents d
     JOIN rh.employees e ON ((d.employee_id = e.id)))
  WHERE ((d.status)::text = 'ativo'::text);

SELECT company_id,
    status,
    count(*) AS quantidade,
    sum(valor_total) AS valor_total,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE ((data_vencimento < CURRENT_DATE) AND ((status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['pendente'::character varying, 'em_analise'::character varying])::text[])))) AS quantidade_vencidas,
    sum(valor_total) FILTER (WHERE ((data_vencimento < CURRENT_DATE) AND ((status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['pendente'::character varying, 'em_analise'::character varying])::text[])))) AS valor_vencido,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (((data_vencimento >= CURRENT_DATE) AND (data_vencimento <= (CURRENT_DATE + '7 days'::interval))) AND ((status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['pendente'::character varying, 'em_analise'::character varying])::text[])))) AS quantidade_vencendo_7_dias,
    sum(valor_total) FILTER (WHERE (((data_vencimento >= CURRENT_DATE) AND (data_vencimento <= (CURRENT_DATE + '7 days'::interval))) AND ((status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['pendente'::character varying, 'em_analise'::character varying])::text[])))) AS valor_vencendo_7_dias
   FROM tributario.obrigacoes_fiscais
  WHERE (is_active = true)
  GROUP BY company_id, status;
